column5: Just wanted to mentioned that Clarks built a new cabin on Carrillon Lake.Old one got burned down in a fire and so this lake has not been fished for 12 YEARS.I would say anyone wanting to fish some virgin waters and I would think some very good walleye/pike this might be a great opportunity.There are a couple of weeks open.Min amount of fisherman would be 4 but this huge cabin will hold 10 at 28x40 ft.I might get in there but my guide schedule is busy but do have a few days here and there and if cabin is free a few days that would be chance of a lifetime to fish there.
Looks like a roller coaster ride to get down to the dock !.......LOL.
First you have to get to the top before you can ride it!around 1600 for a seven day ride,about the same as Disney world!
Would love this adventure but being a solo it wont happen. Have always wanted to do a solo fly in but cant afford the minimum and nobody takes a solo fly guy.
Exciting place.You can eat all you want while your there and get some exercise to as a bonus.
You can always ask on WC if anyones looking for a flyin,be fun to go with a group from WC.
Who wants to go to Disney world.You get free exciting ride from cabin down to dock every day.
